media:group.media:title: ีึีปีกึีกีฏีดีกีถ ีจีถีฉีกึึีธึีด ีฟีฒีฅึึีจ ีซีถีฑ ีกีญีบีฅึ ีงีซีถ ีคีกึีฑีฅีฌโค ีกีผีกีปีถีกีฃีฎีซ ีขีธึีชึีธึีตึีจ

ิฒีธึีชึีธึีตึีจ ีบีกีฟีดีธึีด ีง 2023-ีซ, ีพีกีทีฟีซ ีฟีฒีกีถีฅึีซ, ีพีกีทีฟีซ ีฐึีกีดีกีถีกีฟีกึีซ ึ ิฑึึีกีญีซ ีฏีธึีฝีฟีซ ีดีกีฝีซีถึ ีีก ีฐีธึีตีฝ ีธึีถีซ, ีธึ ีพีกีทีฟีซ ีฐึีกีดีกีถีกีฟีกึ ีีธีฝ ีีธึีฏีกีฝีตีกีถีซีถ ีฐีกีปีธีฒีพีฅีฌีธึ ีง ีพีฅึีกีฐีธึีฒีกึีฏีกีพีธึีฅีฌ ิตีผีกีขีฌีธึึีธึีดึ
ยซีีกึีค ีบีซีฟีซ ีฟีฅีฝีถีซ ีซึ ีกีนึีธีพ, ีธึ ีฐีกีฝีฏีกีถีก, ีฆีฃีก ีซึ ีฏีกีทีพีซ ีพึีก, ีฉีฅ ีซีถีน ีง ีฐีธีฒ ีฟีกีฌีจ, ีคีธึึีฝ ีฃีกีฌีจโคโคโคยป,- ีกีฝีธึีด ีง ิฑึีธึีฝีตีกีฏีจึ

media:group.media:title: Building a powerful Armenian identity
media:group.media:description:
Renowned British comedian Kev Orkian joins Patrick on the Civilnet podcast to share his insights as an Armenian in the Diaspora. They discuss the importance of remembering the Armenian Genocide and crafting a hopeful vision for the future. In a wide-ranging conversation, Orkian also offers his perspectives on cultivating Armenian pride, changing negative mindsets, and creating a compelling narrative to empower the nation.

media:group.media:title: ิปีีถีน ีงึ ีฐีกีถึีกีบีฅีฟีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีซึ ีฅึึีธึีคีจ
media:group.media:description:
ยซีีกีถึีกีบีฅีฟีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีซึ ีฅึึีธึีคีจี ีคีกึีฅึีธีพ ีฅึีกีฆีกีฎีจ, ีนีกึีกีฆีกีถึ ีฝีซึีฅีฌีซ ีธึ ีดีธีฟ, ีขีกีตึ ีฅึีขีฅีดีถ ีฐีธีฃีฅีขีกีถีธึีฅีถ ีกีตีถึีกีถ ีฐีฅีผีธึ, ีกีฝีฅีฝ ีกีผีกีฝีบีฅีฌ ีฌีซีถีซยป,- ีกีฝีพีธึีด ีง ีีธึีกีตึ ีีกึีฃีฝีตีกีถีซ ยซีีกีถึีกีบีฅีฟีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีซึ ีฅึึีธึีคยป-ีจ ีพีฅีบีซ ีกีถีธีฟีกึีซีกีตีธึีด:

entry.title: Never Forget, Never Repeat: Commemorating the Armenian Genocide

media:group.media:title: Never Forget, Never Repeat: Commemorating the Armenian Genocide
media:group.media:description:
On this week's Insights, host Eric examines the upcoming departure of EU Special Representative Toivo Klaar from his role in the South Caucasus. He analyzes what led to this change and considers its potential implications. The episode also touches on the ongoing recognition efforts for the 109th anniversary of the Armenian Genocide, keeping alive observations on justice and remembrance of the past.
